types.name: 🐛 fix: resolve bug in existing functionality
💄 style: apply code style changes (formatting, whitespace)
♻️ refactor: restructure code without changing behavior
🏗 build: modify build system or dependencies
⚙️ ci: update CI/CD configuration (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, etc.)
🛠 chore: perform maintenance tasks (configs, scripts, etc.)

messages.scope: specify the scope of this change (optional, press enter to skip):
messages.subject: write a short, lowercase, imperative description (max 50 chars):
messages.body: provide a longer description (optional, press enter to skip):
messages.footer: reference any issues (e.g., #123) (optional, press enter to skip):
